Title: Ladies Storm rose gold plated multi dial watch 4720/W
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ladies Storm rose gold plated multi dial watch 4720/W RRP £149.99 Now £89.99 Description The ultra slim strap on this ladies Multi Slim Storm watch is lightweight and will sit comfortably flat against the wrist. In keeping with the boyfriend style of watch, this particular model features the popular oversized dial that is so fashionable and found on many women’s designer watches right now but with a modern, feminine twist. The dial measures approximately 43mm in width including the crown and has a slim depth of approximately 5mm. The slightly curved glass face has a clear and easy to read dial which features several inner dials including the day, date and a 24 hour clock. The combination of the glossy white background and the rose gold plated details is striking and feminine. The Storm logo features on the dial as well as on the push button clasp; all Storm watches are provided in the official original branded packaging along with a two year manufacturer’s guarantee. Chapelle are authorised stockists of Storm watches as well as many other designer brands of ladies and men’s watches. Chapelle reference 08790404. Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
